author: Author

marketplace.title: Marketplace Connector
marketplace.betaNotice: 2600Hz Marketplace is still in Beta phase and is not fully certified for production use. Please expect some bugs and limitations in features and send us your feedback.

welcome.title: A new way to make Kazoo awesome is
welcome.encouragement: The 2600Hz Marketplace helps you get the most out of KAZOO. In addition, we are working hard to offer the best experience to discover and install applications in your cluster.

linkage.title: Connect your cluster to 2600Hz Marketplace
linkage.lead: In order to use applications from 2600Hz Marketplace, please follow these steps to connect your cluster to marketplace:
linkage.stepSingin: Please sign in to your 2600Hz Marketplace account
linkage.stepGoto: On the Marketplace, go to Account Settings by clicking on Account Name on the top right of the page -> Manage Account ->
linkage.stepGenerateCode: After clicking Link My Cluster, click on Generate Access Code
linkage.stepCopyCode: Copy the newly generated Access Code

edition.subtitle: Appex Client Configuration
edition.helpClusterName: A friendly name for your cluster to help you recognize it easier on Marketplace portal
edition.helpApiUrl: The base URL to use for serving UI app assets for Marketplace applications
edition.helpDangerDisable: Disables the Marketplace Connector. If disabled, Marketplace application won't be started by Kazoo. Disabling Marketplace in a running node won't stop currently running Marketplace applications.
edition.helpDangerDisconnect: Disconnects your cluster from the 2600Hz Marketplace, this won't stop running Marketplace applications
edition.helpMore: To learn more about the Marketplace Connector and these settings, please see the
edition.helpWarnDangerDisable: Your service might be disrupted if the Marketplace Connector is not running!
edition.helpWarnDangerDisconnect: Once you delete your Cluster connection, there is no going back. Your service may be disrupted!
edition.kazooAllInOneHelpText: Indicates all Kazoo Erlang nodes in your cluster are running the same set of Kazoo applications. Turning this on will make sure starting Marketplace application on one node will start them in other Kazoo nodes in your cluster.
edition.kazooVersionHelpText: To set your meta kazoo please go to Marketplace portal, Manage Cluster page
edition.successUpdate: You successfully saved changes to configuration!

dangerDisconnectDialog.title: Confirmation of Disconnecting from Marketplace
dangerDisconnectDialog.messageIntro: This action CANNOT be undone. This will permanently disconnect your cluster from the 2600Hz Marketplace and you won't be able start Marketplace application anymore.
dangerDisconnectDialog.messageExplanation: Please type the word "{{variable}}" in the following input and then click on the Disconnect button to proceed.

dangerDisableDialog.content: This will disable the Marketplace connector. The next time your KAZOO nodes start, apps purchased through the Marketplace will not be started. Do not forget to also remove those applications from your Kazoo nodes start up list.

unlinkedCluster.mainText: Hmmm. We are currently unable to access the Marketplace Connector app. It appears your cluster was disconnected using your Marketplace Account's disconnection routine. To restore the Connector app and access the Cluster Connection page, please select the button below. You will then need to restart the cluster connection process from the Marketplace.

alerts.noUserSelected:
You must select at least one user for this app.

If you don't want any user to use this app, you can turn it off.

__comment: UI-1190: Updating the way apps are turned on/off
UI-1190: Updating the way apps are turned on/off
appStoreDisabled: It looks like the App Store has been disabled for this account. Contact your administrator for more information.
